info.title: Reservation Backend API
info.description: API documentation for the Apartment Reservation System

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of apartments with optional filters
Retrieve detailed information about a specific apartment
Retrieve all apartments marked as favorite by the authenticated user

post.description: Add or remove apartment from favorites

get.description: Retrieve all reviews for a specific apartment

post.description: Submit a review and rating for an apartment

booking_id.description: Optional booking ID if review is for a completed booking

get.description: Retrieve all reservations for the authenticated user
Retrieve detailed information about a specific reservation

post.description: Create a new booking/reservation for an apartment

400.description: Apartment not available for selected dates

post.description: Update an existing reservation (only pending reservations can be updated)

400.description: Only pending reservations can be updated or apartment not available

get.description: Retrieve all conversations for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new conversation between renter and apartment owner

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific conversation
Retrieve all messages in a conversation

post.description: Send a message in a conversation (real-time via Reverb)
Mark all unread messages in a conversation as read

get.description: Retrieve all governorates with their cities (Public endpoint - no authentication required)
Retrieve all cities with optional governorate filter (Public endpoint - no authentication required)
Retrieve all cities for a specific governorate (Public endpoint - no authentication required)
Retrieve a specific governorate with its cities (Public endpoint - no authentication required)
Retrieve a specific city with its governorate (Public endpoint - no authentication required)
Retrieve all notifications for the authenticated user

post.description: Mark a specific notification as seen

get.description: Get the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user
Retrieve user notifications with optional filter for unread only
Retrieve all apartments owned by the authenticated user (OWNER account type required)

403.description: Unauthorized - Only OWNER account type can access

post.description: Create a new apartment listing (OWNER account type required, account must be APPROVED)

get.description: Get governorates and cities for creating apartments (OWNER account type required)
Retrieve detailed information about a specific apartment owned by the authenticated user (OWNER account type required)

post.description: Update an existing apartment (OWNER account type required)

delete.description: Permanently delete an apartment (OWNER account type required, cannot delete if has active bookings)

400.description: Cannot delete apartment with active bookings

get.description: Retrieve all photos for an apartment (OWNER account type required)

post.description: Upload one or more photos for an apartment (OWNER account type required)

delete.description: Delete a specific photo from an apartment (OWNER account type required)

post.description: Set a specific photo as the cover photo for an apartment (OWNER account type required)

get.description: Retrieve all bookings for a specific apartment (OWNER account type required)

post.description: Register a new user account with personal information and documents
Authenticate user and return access token

get.description: Retrieve authenticated user's profile information
Retrieve authenticated user's avatar image URL
Retrieve authenticated user's identity document image URL

post.description: Update authenticated user's profile information including images
